song_name: Miracle Twinkle Christmas Time(舞台KING OF PRISM-Over the Sunshine!-)
singer: エーデルローズ新入生
lyrics: 奇跡をプレゼントするよ　幸せに煌めきをSing in the Twinkle Twinkle Nightイルミネーションが胸をDoKi-DoKiさせちゃうみたいに(Are you ready sparking？)君のハートのスイッチClick！Click！しちゃっていいかな？(What are you wanna do？)伝えたいメッセージKiRa-KiRaあふれてMelody Line(Are you ready sparking？)奏でる歌声って、夢を飾るオーナメントさ！∞カラットのダイアモンドみたいな瞳のTwinkle Starスマイルって素敵なクリスマス・ツリー！カウントダウンしよう、一緒に…1.2.3！Party！Party！Party！Party！Very Merry Christmas Time！Here we go！一瞬だって見逃せないようなShow Time！(We are Sparking！)手を取ってごらんよ、連れてってあげる見たことないようなParty！Party！Party！Party！Very Merry Christmas Time！Here we go！楽しくってしかたなくなるよねSing in the Twinkle Twinkle NightMiracleはきっと君のこと想っている時に起こるんだ…My Dear僕らは、そうさ『サンタクロース』プレゼントするよParty！Party！Party！Party！Party！Party！Party！Party！Very Merry Christmas Time！Here we go！一瞬だって見逃せないようなShow Time！(We are Sparking！)手を取ってごらんよ、連れてってあげる見たことないようなParty！Party！Party！Party！Very Merry Christmas Time！Here we go！楽しくってしかたなくなるよねSing in the Twinkle Twinkle Night…Holy Shiny Christmas Night！
translated_lyrics: I'm going to give you a miracle like Sing in the Twinkle Twinkle Night Illumination, just like DoKi-Dok.You're the switch-click of your heart!Click!I don't know, okay?What are you Wanna Do?Message KiRa-KiRa flooding with Melody Line (Are you ready sparking?)A singing voice, a dream, a tournament in which to decorate it!Infinity's diamond, Twinkle Star Smile with a nice Christmas tree!Countdown. Together ... 1.2.3!Party!Party!Party!Party!Very Merry Christmas Time!Here we go!You can't miss it for a moment. Show Time!-We are Sokai!Take your hands off me, and you'll take them with you a Party like you've never seen before!Party!Party!Party!Very Merry Christmas Time!Here we go!Sing in the Twinkle Twinkle NightMiracle is going to happen when you think about it. My Dear, we're going to give you the Santa Claus as a gift for you. Party!Party!Party!Party!Party!Party!Party!Party!Very Merry Christmas Time!Here we go!You can't miss it for a moment. Show Time!-We are Sokai!Take your hands off me, and you'll take them with you a Party like you've never seen before!Party!Party!Party!Very Merry Christmas Time!Here we go!Sing in the Twinkle Twinkle Night...Holy ShinShiny Christmas Night!
